content: adult crochet beanie pattern the squishy adult hat is a soft and warm beanie-style hat that comes in one size for adults m/l instructions include a chart for the first six rounds of the hat the hat is designed to pair with the squishy hat 1 for babies if you would like to make a gift set like the squishy hat 2 this crochet hat pattern uses front post double_crochet stitches to add texture to your project this crochet hat pattern will also give you an opportunity to use the magic loop and invisible join methods you will find links in the pattern to tutorials for both of these techniques materials needed - worsted weight yarn in the color s of your choice - crochet hook size h or size needed to obtain gauge - tapestry needle - optional stitch markers pattern is written in english using standard u s crochet terms level advanced beginner please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www craftingeachday com the benefit of purchasing this pdf pattern is to receive an ad-free version that is easy to print and read if you have any questions while you are working on your project please feel free to email me at crafting pattern@gmail com and i will do my best to answer your questions and give you help for more crochet project ideas please visit craftingeachday com © copyright 2019 crafting each day do not copy sell or reproduce this pattern without my permission feel free to sell finished items made using this pattern with a credit line for the pattern and a link to my website at craftingeachday com 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/squishy-hat-4 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/squishy-hat-4
